programme.title: Duck Family Treasure

programme.title: Duck Family Treasure
programme.desc: After getting an insider tip, Jase, Jep and Murry hunt for historical relics at Grant's Canal, a failed military operation from the 1800s; Si strikes a deal with an auction house so they can sell their treasures for cash money.

programme.title: Duck Family Treasure
programme.desc: After learning that Missy and Jessica are going to Abilene, Texas, to feather the nest for their college kids, Jase, Jep and Murry use the trip as a rare opportunity to hunt for World War II artifacts on American soil at an old training ground.

programme.title: Duck Family Treasure
programme.desc: The treasure hunters go on a men's night out at the Magnolia Ridge, a beautiful historical property that connects back to the Lewis and Clark expedition; Si orchestrates a photoshoot for the guys to help them gain exposure.

programme.title: Duck Family Treasure

programme.title: Duck Family Treasure
